title: Reconstruction of the new building on the plot should conform to provisions of DP and these Regulations
clause_text: Reconstruction of the new building on the plot should conform to provisions of DP and these Regulations.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
